about_the_game:
Project Eternal is a sci-fi mechanical style card construction tower defense game

Game Features





-Unique building mechanics
Unlike previous tower defense games, players need to build turrets by drawing cards.
Build up a shuffle energy bar and refresh the turret designs you have at the right time.
You can only build a turret once each time it is refreshed, so consider carefully where to place it.
Defeat incoming enemies to gain resources of the appropriate color.




-Dynamic deck building
After you pass each level, you can draw new turret designs from the research results box as a reward.
Choose them to add to your deck and combine and match them to bring out the power of the deck to defeat enemies and challenge boss.


-Control tactical facilities to aid in defense
Missiles, freezing lasers, or satellite rays
In future updates players will be able to use the resources they collect to purchase powerful defensive facilities.
They are expensive and have a limited number of uses, but when used properly, one hit can turn the tide of battle.

name: Project Eternal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

short_description: Project Eternal is a deck-building tower defense game. Use the cards you receive as rewards to keep creating unique combinations of turrets and defeat the oncoming enemies.
